titles: Double your guards; in answer to a bloody and seditious pamphlet, entituled An alarum to the armies of England, Scotland, and Ireland.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: "An alarum to the armies of England, Scotland, and Ireland" remains untraced.
